Posts.Content: May 6, 2010 03:57PM cjcc wrote: I use to get hot flashes when I was on tamoxifen. My dr prescribed(if you can believe it) Paxil.  It worked wonders for me.
Posts.Title: Hot flash relief? RegulJ nursecal

Posts.Content: Apr 25, 2010 08:15AM cjcc wrote: I was going back and forth with dbl vs single.  I decided on a single mast. on my left breast. In 2001 I had a lumpectomy on my rt breast.  I have been cancer free since then. Now I have cancer in my left. Many people I talked with felt I should take care of the cancer breast with immed. reconstruction.  I will get a breast reduction and breast lift on the right one...either immed. or at a later date.  Hopefully I can do everything at once.  Good luck to you with whatever you decide.
